ygData.subject: RE: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I totally agree with you.  Who s NOT going to camp for things like JBoots?  :)  Tension is a good word to describe the amount of shouting I ve heard in
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I totally agree with you. Who's NOT going to camp for things like
JBoots? :) "Tension" is a good word to describe the amount of shouting
I've heard in areas where people camp for 8-hour long stretches. heh

I think the other ideas I've heard are pretty good... level or class
restrictions. I don't necessarily agree that it's a good idea to make
things rare just for the sake of merchantability (is that a word? heh, you
know what I mean I hope). I think that only encourages the camping behavior
that we're trying to address.

I wonder if Verant is even considering these issues..anybody know? I hate
to be resigned to say that "this stuff happens all the time in MUDs and you
can't do anything about it"....there HAS to be a way! :)
I'm just too clueless to think of a way right now....

-- Lim'Dul


>I mean evryone want those good items and nothing is gona stop them, so
